item.description:
The NHLA will be holding their Annual Meeting on August 16 at 3:00 pm in Epsom. All members are welcome. Meet the board, bring your ideas on how you can help protect and advance liberty in New Hampshire, and give us feedback on important issues of the day.

When we’re done with the “meeting,” plan on staying for a potluck BBQ from 5:00 - 8:00 pm. Please bring something to eat or drink for all to share.

Email chair@nhliberty.org for location.
item.name: NHLA Annual Meeting
